Uses of Interface
com.enigmabridge.retry.EBRetryStrategy

    • Uses of EBRetryStrategy in com.enigmabridge.retry

      Classes in com.enigmabridge.retry that implement EBRetryStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EBRetryStrategyBackoff
      Implementation of BackOff that increases the back off period for each retry attempt using a randomization function that grows exponentially.
      class  EBRetryStrategySimple
      Simple retry strategy, with threshold, no waiting.
